title: jmlkav6699
author: jmlkav6699
content: Hello everybody, I recently bought some bitcoins and i dont see them in my wallet...I have checked on te blockchain that my btc were delivered, Moonpay said the same thing, but I have nothing.Everybody told me to download the whole blockchain through Bitcoin Core, I did it, wich took me 4 days, but after that, still nothing. My Armory wallet is still showing up as empty, I've tried rescanning my balance, but it loads infinitely and stays at 0 percent all the time.. Can somebody help me pls??

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: jmlkav6699 on October 23, 2022, 01:56:04 PMCan somebody help me pls??People tried to help, but ended up asking more questions.So instead of opening this new topic you should have been returning to the old one: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5417452

comments.author: hosemary
comments.created_time: October 23, 2022, 08:22:54 PMLast edit: October 23, 2022, 09:03:58 PM by hosseinimr93
comments.body: jmlkav6699, Armory doesn't work if you download the blockchain in prune mode. I knew this, but I don't know why I forgot to mention that when replying to your other topic. I am sorry. If you can't store the full blockhchain, as mentioned by BitMaxz in that topic, the only solution for you is to import your private key(s) into a SPV wallet like electrum.If pruning was enabled when downloading the blockchain, that's what caused the problem.

comments.author: jmlkav6699
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on October 23, 2022, 03:27:48 PMQuote from: jmlkav6699 on October 23, 2022, 01:56:04 PMCan somebody help me pls??People tried to help, but ended up asking more questions.So instead of opening this new topic you should have been returning to the old one: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5417452Yh Im sorry bout that, but i dont know why I couldn't access the topic anymore

comments.author: jmlkav6699
comments.body: Quote from: hosseinimr93 on October 23, 2022, 08:22:54 PMjmlkav6699, Armory doesn't work if you download the blockchain in prune mode. I knew this, but I don't know why I forgot to mention that when replying to your other topic. I am sorry. If you can't store the full blockhchain, as mentioned by BitMaxz in that topic, the only solution for you is to import your private key(s) into a SPV wallet like electrum.If pruning was enabled when downloading the blockchain, that's what caused the problem.Ooooh... I guess thats whats the problem then.. I've tried sweeping my private keys into my electrum wallet but, once again, I don't know if it's gonna work, as the transaction shows as 'unconfirmed'..?

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: Quote from: jmlkav6699 on October 23, 2022, 09:37:48 PMOoooh... I guess thats whats the problem then.. I've tried sweeping my private keys into my electrum wallet but, once again, I don't know if it's gonna work, as the transaction shows as 'unconfirmed'..?It has worked. By sweeping your private keys, you actually made a transaction to your electrum wallet. Now, your transaction has been broadcast to the network and you should be able to see that on block explorers as well. It will be confirmed sooner or later. The confirmation time depends on the fee rate you used for your transaction. Whatever fee you paid, it shouldn't take long. Network isn't busy.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: jmlkav6699 on October 23, 2022, 09:37:48 PMOoooh... I guess thats whats the problem then.. I've tried sweeping my private keys into my electrum wallet but, once again, I don't know if it's gonna work, as the transaction shows as 'unconfirmed'..?If it's shown unconfirmed after you sweep it means you already did the right way to sweep the private key.Just make sure you have full control of your Electrum wallet you must save the seed phrase somewhere safe or write them on the piece of paper because you can use them for future recovery.Electrum is much user friendly than Armory if you want to use armory in the future you must have some knowledge about Bitcoin core because Armory wallet does not work without downloading the whole blockchain and honestly on my first try using Armory I didn't experience that issue because I follow some guides in YouTube and also here https://www.bitcoinarmory.com/tutorials/
